page.title: 06RAGDALE HALL HEALTH HYDRO _2
page.content: On arrival at Ragdale Hall guests are weighed and givan dietary advice, particularly if weight reduction is the aim of the visit. There are a whole range of beauty treatments available and these include body massage, G5 massage, fasials, make-up, hairdressing, wax treatments, manicure and pedicure, infra_red treatment and underwater treatment in the Jacuzzi pool. There is a sauna, a salarium and a heated indoor swimming pool. There is also a well_equipped gymnasium where guests can exercise. The cuisine is low_calorie and superb and meals are taken in an attractive oak_panelled dining room.
